video.title: Deploy a Dynamic Website in Minutes
video.description:
Links used in this video:

Start Bootstrap for free mobile-responsive templates: https://startbootstrap.com/

POWR for free plugins: http://powr.io

Bit Balloon for instant deployment: https://www.bitballoon.com/

Optional: 

Atom (if you want a good free text editor): https://atom.io

Again, these are all free and easily accessible. 

If you want a domain for your site, we recommend Name Cheap: www.namecheap.com/?aff=102130 (affiliate link)

Save $10 on a proper cloud server with Digital Ocean: http://m.do.co/c/ba8a71773373 (affiliate link)

About Free Code Camp:

We're a community where you learn to code, contribute to open source, and get a developer job. More than 5,000 people have gotten developer jobs so far, and we've only been going for two years.

Join our community at http://freecodecamp.com

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/intent/user?screen_name=freecodecamp

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/freecodecamp

Follow Quincy (the guy who made this video) on Quora: http://www.quora.com/Quincy-Larson

topLevelComment.author: Martin P.
topLevelComment.text: 'Yon ba yo'ng dynamic website?

topLevelComment.author: 紀章kisho
topLevelComment.text: Can the visitors message in the contact form be sent to ones email box instead to POWr?

topLevelComment.author: Swatilekha Roy
topLevelComment.text: Awesome.

topLevelComment.author: Sasank Sasank
topLevelComment.text: Iam seeing how these services improved in last 4 years

topLevelComment.author: Rafael Rondon
topLevelComment.text: You only missed one thing: how do you change the domain name to something without bit balloon?

topLevelComment.author: ASHVIN -
topLevelComment.text: wow

topLevelComment.author: def def
topLevelComment.text: why won't the pictures from the freelancer template render in my browser?

topLevelComment.author: Soad
topLevelComment.text: Thank you so much.

topLevelComment.author: Fullstack with Santosh
topLevelComment.text: What the hell was this. -_-

replies.author: Amrit Nalam
replies.text: What's wrong? Was anything wrong in the video?

topLevelComment.author: Art Hernandez
topLevelComment.text:
What is the difference between having the freelance tamplate on bitballoon vs gh-pages? 
I just didnt get the same result when I put it on gh-pages branch.

topLevelComment.author: Tim
topLevelComment.text: Thank you!

topLevelComment.author: Sergi
topLevelComment.text: There's certain people who knows their stuff very well who argues that using bootstrap like that instead of really learning everything HTML and CSS has to offer is a mistake in the long run? That when something fails is hard to know how to fix it sometimes?

replies.author: jukezmadness
replies.text: I've been pondering this question myself recently. I think  its important to practice CSS without bootstrap so that you understand how it works, but also making your own framework is good and or using others to be more well rounded in the design aspect.

topLevelComment.author: Hiresh Trivedi
topLevelComment.text: will you please share the fonts and theme of atom editor you used in the window? thank you

topLevelComment.author: Dima UA
topLevelComment.text: Thanks a lot. Just hosted my first website ever!

topLevelComment.author: Juvenal Miranda Jr
topLevelComment.text: So usefully!!  Thanks a lot!

topLevelComment.author: Downthehollow
topLevelComment.text: I came into the video skeptical.  Was not disappointed.  I might try and use these in the future :)

replies.author: FiNiteTV
replies.text: Same. The beginning screen really looked like an advertisement for their site. Luckily, they aren't one of those channels who flood videos with ads for their site, yet they provide useful information.

topLevelComment.text: great video!!

topLevelComment.author: Annis Monadjem
topLevelComment.text: This video is really great!

topLevelComment.text: This is great! thanks so much
